Reviews.Title: Got this for my dad, he loves it more then he loves me.
Reviews.Author: chris gargarello
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my dad. I always wanted to buy him a huge TV and this was the one I picked. He had a 50" Samsung DLP from 2006 so it was time for him to get a better set with better picture. He loves DLP and this is the only company in the game so thats what I got. I ordered it from dell and it came to him in a week. I paid 1000 with free shipping and a free 2 year warranty. I was not sure of the quality of this, do not listen to the guy that complains about the white dots, this TV has a new chip that has resolved this problem.  I was hoping that this TV would look as good as my Samsung DLP with led light engine. I got the 61" the last year they made them and it is a fantastic tv and I wish Samsung had stuck with DLP. He got the monster and set it up him self and got it working, point of this, setting up TV's is not the old mans thing so it must be an easy one to set up. It took him a few days to tweek the picture the way he wanted and when he did he sat down and watched Snow white and the Huntsman on Blu-Ray. The picture was so good it blew him and his wife away. he said and i quote " it was almost to much for his brain to process". He loves this TV more then me I think.  Bottom line, this is a fantastic buy. If you have no need to hang a TV on a wall this is the best pick for the money. The picture will keep up with any LCD LED or plasma out and will cost about 1/3 of the price. The bulb will need to be changed in a few years and cost about $60. They have made changing the bulb easy as cake. 3 screws and its done, my mom could do it. If you are thinking of this TV or one of the other Mitsu DLPs, go for it! I think you will be happy you gave t a shot!!!! Happy retirement dad, enjoy sitting on your ass watching this beast!!!!

Reviews.Title: Best TV
Reviews.Author: Roberr
Reviews.Content: best picture i have ever seen,easy set up, like going to the movies, i dont think iweel ever go to the movies again

Reviews.Title: Huge TV!!!!
Reviews.Author: Austin  Brown
Reviews.Content: The other reviews are correct.  i did see a slightly warped image when i first hooked up this tv. I have a computer, Xbox and WII hooked up.  To fix the picture for the wii and xbox, which are hooked up by component using a splitter, i had to press the format button on the remote to set the display to standard.  I still can not get the display perfect from my computer although i am going form display port to HDMI.  The computer display is slightly warped on the right side,  It is not enough to notice during movie playback. but you can tell the edges of dialog boxes are slightly bent.  On another note. make sure you can manually ajust your picture size output from the video card or the display from the computer will not fit the screen.  Adjusting the resolution will not fix this.Other than the warp issue, the display is absolutely stunning.  I can see the picture in daylight and it is really crisp.  Best of all, it is HUGE.Over all i can't complain about this tv, it is huge and it did not cost me $2000.

Reviews.Title: big
Reviews.Author: Lori Nichols "william Barnes"
Reviews.Content: this tv is so asome, beautiful picture and sound. with my new Bose suround system this is defenetly home theartre at its finest

Reviews.Title: a great product at a great price
Reviews.Author: mad_buyer
Reviews.Content: I bought the Mitsubishi C12 73 inch DLP for my wife after owning a 65 inch Mitsubishi 732 for years.  The picture on both is top grade.  At the price, it can't be beat.  I doubt that  LED, LCD, and plasma TV's can match the picture clarity, the price, and the longevity of the DLP's.  I've read the Mitsubishi is getting out of the DLP business. I hope they reconsider.

Reviews.Title: The TV is huge,but I recieved it cracked
Reviews.Author: Fountaine
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed by the quality of the television. During the first week the DvD input function stopped working and the top of the TV was cracked as soon as it was taken out the box. However the seller BLINQ issued a partial refund back and I ended up paying a super lower price for an 82in Flat screen

Reviews.Title: Worth Every Penny...and more
Reviews.Author: Barbara "Creative Goddess"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for our living room and, especially, for my husband who is a TV addict and serious gamer. We love the picture quality, with great color and crispness that we were worried we would lose by purchasing such a large screen. No loss of picture quality whatsoever. Mitsubishi continues to be a brand you can trust that produces a fine product.

Reviews.Title: Hugh TV screen
Reviews.Author: EDDIE WILSON
Reviews.Content: My second Mitsubishi DLP. Who knew that a screen of this size would still produce a great picture. Missing a few of the bells and whistles  that come with a more expensive set, but overall a great TV with a huge screen, at a great price. (less than $1000)

Reviews.Title: Great Product/Delivery
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: Not only did I get a crazy good deal on this TV, but it arrived as expected and looks great!  I purchased this "slightly used" and had some hesitation because the price was so good, but when it arrived it exceeded my expectations.  There is no difference between this product and a new on off the shelf - except for the few thousand less I paid.Great seller, would recommend.

Reviews.Title: My Mitsubishi 73In DLP
Reviews.Author: Julius Chatters
Reviews.Content: I bought another Mitsubishi 73in DLP after I moved and the shippers damaged my last.  I couldn't live without it.  Once I got the new one, it worked just as good as the old one and I fell in love all over again.  You can't beat the price and picture quality of the DLP for the price and it has saved me so much money.  If you want a quality television with 3D capability, get your hands on the DLPs while supplies last.  You won't be sorry you did.

Reviews.Title: need a blub or something
Reviews.Author: stan lee
Reviews.Content: got this tv for superbowl was grat that day then it start get cutting off when we watch call mistsubishi many times about  a new tv all they said need a need blub but i just bought this set why i need a new blub couldnt  understand  them also we a big  problem wont ever buy another tv from this company.

Reviews.Title: Just AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Holy !!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Content: Holy ____ this TV is amazing the best picture I have ever seen. I have been shopping for over a year for a huge TV. I have never written a review in my life but on this occassion I have to. I have grown up my whole life having extremely big TV's and this is the finest TV I have ever owned or seen. My family and I are just in pure shock having a movie theatre in our home with the most stunning quality. I cannot wait to get home from work every day to basque in the glory of the worlds finest 82 inch Tv.

Reviews.Title: beautiful TV
Reviews.Author: Melissa L. Gray
Reviews.Content: Very nice but the sound needs work expected it to have a better sound system the it has. Added my bose surround and it made it great

Reviews.Title: Best buy in a long time
Reviews.Author: Richard Bass,     Richard Bass
Reviews.Content: TV is great, love it so far. would recomend it to a freind., Pitchur is great, so big and proud.

Reviews.Title: Best pic!!
Reviews.Author: jerrykezman
Reviews.Content: Had old model '06  This has great picture. Lighter ,best buy. Great price,best value!! For a T.V this size. Amazon, delivered checked see if worked. Set up. The best!!

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: D. Hahn "apostate apostle"
Reviews.Content: I have never really cared for projection TVs but they have come a long way.  They have improved the angle of view issue considerably, but continues to annoy.  If you look strait at it the picture is amazing, lay on the floor or stand up, you notice the difference.Pros:Huge screen, great picture, heck it's a tv what else matters right?  I do not have the issues other reviewers have mentioned, their sets may have been damaged in shipping. I think it is more fragile than normal flat screens.Cons:1. When you are on over the air (antenna) and change channels it pauses for several seconds, I assume while it syncs with the digital signal, however it will not respond and gives you no indication of what is happening.  We use "hdmi in" most of the time so it's not a big deal for us. Just thought I would mention it.2. Lack of ports (input and output) this model only has the basics, we added a Yamaha RX-V371BL 5.1-Channel A/V Receiver AVR between the HDMI sources and the TV to be able to add surround sound.  Most people are doing this anyway. (so no Surround sound on OTA) Just double check the ports beforehand.3. The overall construction does seem a bit on the cheap side, button feel, screen moves slightly etc.  But honestly everything is these days.4. Size, the back really sticks out there, I know the design requires more room, but I expected a bit less real-estate. I still give it 5 stars with the few minor issues when considering the price.

Reviews.Title: So far.. not too happy..
Reviews.Author: Matty
Reviews.Content: Bought this product for a great price.. 980 bucks including shipping and tax.. the tv looked great when i first got it.. i watched 6 hours of flawless tv for the first two days.. my friends were all in awe that a dlp could have such a great picture.. which it did.. until the third day.. On the third day vertical lines spread across the tv ruining the picture. .. i called mistu asap and they surprisingly picked up the phone quickly.. they gave me some troubleshooting tips, which all failed, then told me to call back monday to talk the dlp experts.. 2 days later.. i called mistu and they set up an appt with a local electronic spot to fix my tv.. thank god for warranty.. the tv guy said i would have to wait for 7-10 days for part to come in and then set up another appt.. what an epic fail.. i really hope they fix the tv and this problem never returns.. such an awesome picture and size for the price.. but if these thing doesnt get fixed soon im going to really regret buying this.. even with this set back.. i still want to give this product a positive review.. but after ordering this tv a month ago.. waited 2 weeks to receive and now another 2 weeks im going to wait to get it working properly, im getting upset.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Flennoy Walker
Reviews.Content: this tv plays great the picture is very clear and sounds great easy to use i use it im my back yard

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Victor Minnone
Reviews.Content: Could not be happier with my purchase. For a used item it works flawlessly. I mostly game on this bad boy and I see no ghosting what so ever.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Smitty1
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing TV. Had a 60" since 2004 and loved it.Just wanted to upgrade. This tv ran through my 5.1 surround sound is truly like the Cinema! Blue Ray player is a must to enjoy this televisions potential!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Big Screen TV
Reviews.Author: gerrylct
Reviews.Content: Amazing that I received this huge TV including delivery for only $850! TV to me is enormous after only using a 32". I have a vcr, ps3 and antennae hooked up and you can switch to any one you want with the remote. I can't even find a TV comparable to this one for less than $3000 at CT retailers. Amazing to buy a TV this big for the price. People are larger than real life, nature photography in videos are stunning on this TV. For me this is a fantastic TV.

Reviews.Title: really like it
Reviews.Author: monty
Reviews.Content: i really like the tv . even tho its really a lot bigger than i need once i moved my livingroom around i find myself enjoying it more every day

Reviews.Title: Rapid clicking sound when Changing Channels
Reviews.Author: Wendy Perkins
Reviews.Content: I purchased this T.V. Several days ago. Whle the picture is pretty amazing I note a couple problems which lead me to return the unit.1. Rapid clicking sound when changing channels. I have the TV connected to a HD TiVo via HDMI cable. When I go to change the channel, the tv monitor speakers produce a very rapid clicking noise until the next channel finally comes in. I note this sound is also produced when rewinding, pausing, or replaying anything from the TiVo Box.2. White dots problem. I note a small square area , that leaves a latent image of a square pattern of white dots, the size is about 3" x 3" and appears only briefly and sporadically upon the screen.For a brand new , out of the box TV I am not happy with the above. Must return.

Reviews.Title: Have received two of these both with damage screens
Reviews.Author: someguysteve
Reviews.Content: both tv's have a bow effect on the bottom the screen and door frames or straight lines have a warped look. stay clear of this tv cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: Cheap quality
Reviews.Author: Fletch
Reviews.Content: I too have replaced 2 of these units; both had unacceptable blurring/halo effect and the last one I received had bowing at the bottom of the screen.  I would not recommend this TV to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Arrived with problems
Reviews.Author: Internet is for shopping
Reviews.Content: 3 problems.1. Screen arrived bent at the edge.2. Lines in the bottom right corner are warped3. Halos on top and bottom.Update: received a replacement. The screen is relatively flat and no halos, but the lines are a bit warped. No idea if this can be fixed. Disappointed in dlp's. Will be buying an LCD next. 65 inch lcd's are much closer in price to 73 inch dlp's now.

ProductInfo.Name: Mitsubishi WD73C12 Home Cinema 73-Inch DLP 1080p Projection TV (2012 Model)
